ygData.subject: Re: Clinging Darkness
ygData.msgSnippet: I find clinging darkness useful on retreating opponents, for it slows them down. need not cast it on every fight, but it has its uses. I dont know of the
ygData.messageBody:
I find clinging darkness useful on retreating opponents, for it slows them
down. need not cast it on every fight, but it has its uses. I dont know of
the damage, but its a level 4 necro spell. I should perhaps discover how
much damage it does.

----------
> From: Eric Muringer <muringer@...>
> To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Clinging Darkness
> Date: Friday, April 30, 1999 10:47 AM
>
> From: "Eric Muringer" <muringer@...>
>
> Doen anyone know how much damage this does? Someone told me it costs 20
mana
> which seems pretty cheap. I see myself casting it every fight.
>
>
